synopsis.text: Chinese historical novel Romance of the Three Kingdoms gets a fresh, moe twist in this action-packed, all-female cast anime. After Kan'u and Chouhi's group successfully complete their legendary quest, they stumble upon a mysterious girl who turns out to be the real Ryuubi. Her name and heirloom sword were stolen by an imposter, and now the group embarks on a brand new quest to retrieve it. Meanwhile, the Chou sisters, a group of street performers, come into possession of a magical book that's more dangerous than they bargained for. With familiar faces and surprising twists, the girls learn that family isn't always about blood relations. Join Kan'u, Chouhi, Ryuubi, and the Chou sisters as they navigate through this thrilling adventure filled with love, comedy, and danger.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
